content:
bug log 2023-06-20 16:30:34 bug description The blog comment function is unavailable,specifically:
At the end of the comment at the end of the blog,the words “No related Issues were found to comment,please contact xxx to initialize creation” Click “login with GitHub” to jump back this blog,no other response Trace the source Google found that the blog uri may be too long.After investigation,it was not caused by this problem.
After observation,it was found that when the page was redirected,the URL in the address bar was followed by the wrong parameter “error=redirect_urixxx”,witch is presumed to be a GitHub callback error.
After investigation,it was found that the blog.mulinbiao.com domain name was bound before,and the callback configured by GitHub OAuth was not updated.
Bug fix Open GitHub settings -> developer settings -> OAuth Apps,change the Homepage URL and Authorization callback URL to https://blog.mulinbiao.com/
title: Blog bug log

content:
Prelude I wanted to start my own blog a long time age,bug I was always busy(lazy). Taking advantage of the gap between graduation,I finally decided to take the time to start realizing it. The main purpose of starting this blog is as follows:
record life and thoughts
Writing a blog can record one’s experience,feelings,thinking and opinions in the form of words, witch can not only help oneself better understand one’s thinking and sum up experience, but also share one’s own mental journey with others.
Communicate and learn
A blog is also a platform for communication and learning.You can communicate and share your experiences and insights with other bloggers,readers and peers, to gain more inspiration and learning opportunities.
About this blog This blog is built using Hugo+Github Pages,please refer to 如何用 GitHub Pages + Hugo 搭建个人博客 and 个人博客记 —— Github pages 绑定个人域名 . In addition,for the purpose of learn foreign languages,I will try my best to publish the Chinese,English and Japanese versions of the blog at the same time. If you find any language or content errors,you are welcome to criticize correct.
This blog uses the second-level domain name blog.mulinbiao.com to resolve to arturiamu.github.io. Since the domain name blog.mulinbiao.com involves issues such as renewal and filing,the connectivity be guaranteed. It is recommended to use arturiamu.github.io for access.

title: Blog description
